event_text: m_c was buried alive when an avalanche hit the camp.

history.reg_death: m_c was buried alive in an avalanche.

event_text: m_c sneaks out of camp but finds {PRONOUN/m_c/self} lost in the strange, angular tunnels that lead out into the territory. The Clan searches for {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in the morning to no avail. The leftover scent of blood and mountain weasel serves as an intense warning to the other kits.

history.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a mountain weasel when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} tried to sneak out of camp.

event_text: m_c during a walk got grabbed by an angry big moth and dropped from a high place, killing {PRONOUN/m_c/object}

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by a big moth.
history.lead_death: was killed by a big moth.

event_text: m_c got grabbed by a big moth whilst saving r_c

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by a big moth.
history.lead_death: was killed by a big moth.

event_text: m_c was out in the middle of camp when suddeny a large moth descended onto {PRONOUN/m_c/object} and carried {PRONOUN/m_c/object} away, never to be seen again.

history.reg_death: m_c was killed by a big moth.
history.lead_death: was killed by a big moth.
